ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: Polished Bone Hoops come from the Evil Eyes in East Karana and the Gorge, like the Polished Bone Bracers. Rare drops though (pain in the butt to camp, like
ygData.messageBody:
Polished Bone Hoops come from the Evil Eyes in East Karana and the Gorge,
like the Polished Bone Bracers. Rare drops though (pain in the butt to camp,
like everything else). If you're high enough in level, you can easily camp
the Altar in the gorge for the Lords. It's rumored that they drop more often
there.

Hope that helps.

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 3:42 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

Yes, both are from the Knight. I have heard that the
tunic is about 1 out of 10 kills.

The level ranges sound about right, if you have a
cleric or two you can get by with a little lower. If I
recall, he does use harm touch for about 300 hits, so
be prepared for that.

My guess is that the Polished bone hoops are from
Chief Goonda the Ogre Shaman in W. Karana. Mid 30s
group? Maybe someone else can comment on this..

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Bloodstained Mantle and Bloostained Tunic, both off
> the Undead Knight in
> Unrest? If so, what level party you need (I have
> heard prolly around 26-30?)
> to take him down? And how rare are the drops off
> him?
>
> Also, Polished Bone Hoops, same info needed. Level,
> zone, mob...etc...
>
> Thanks!
